page.title: 20Nercwys and Eryrys - Survey
page.content: This block has been researchd by members of Nercwys Women's Institute, some members of which live within the block. Some members involved have lived in the area all their lives, others are fairly recent newcomers. Much help has been received from others. Official records in Clwyd have given information, as have the owners of the local quarry and tarmacadam plant. Much information was gained from the book 'Just One Parish' by Mrs.Seed Knowles, which is about the parish of Llanarmon, including Eryrys. Many local people made valuable contributions, including the Welsh language and translation. The researchers were:- Miss W.Griffiths, Mrs.A.Roberts, Mrs C.Williams, Mrs.H.Bravey, Mrs.M.Thomas, Miss H.Ingman, Mrs.M.Buckland, Mrs.E.Murphy.
